jump_scares.spoiler: A cat walks out from behind a lamp just after Josephina turns it on
Bryson looks in the rear view mirror and sees a man in the back seat
A monkey’s hand comes out of the painting and grabs Bryson around the head
A man walks in front of Morf accompanied by a loud jump scare sound effect
As Jon adjusts the lightbulb a hand suddenly appears above him
Morf looks at the painting and a hand suddenly moves
Gretchen’s arm is suddenly pulled into the sphere
Morf sees Gretchen on the side of the bus and she moves to reveal a dismembered arm
A man suddenly opens the door to the sound proof room
Hoboman suddenly reaches out and bangs on the wall with one his crutches (just missing Morf)
